mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS, IS_ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS, IS_ADMIN) VALUES( member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberNick}, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{email}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{isAdmin} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = #{memberNick}, MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd}, GENDER = #{gender}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate}, EMAIL = #{email}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, STATUS = #{status}, IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
